version_description:
Fix iOS 7 Crash
Bug fixes

We don't prompt you for reviews (we hate that too), but if you like it, we'd really appreciate it if you'd rate Tailor!

Fix iOS 7 Crash
Bug fixes

We don't prompt you for reviews (we hate that too), but if you like it, we'd really appreciate it if you'd rate Tailor!

By popular demand: PNG Export! Your images will always be PNGs when you share them, even when uploading to Twitter! No more blurry text.

3D Touch quick actions - copy or share stitched images from your home screen

Fixed potential crash on iO
